name: Galactic Blast
description:
I have uploaded a Windows version to download and that works best, i also uploaded a mac version but I don't know if it works, my mac is very old. if none of those work than play the html version this wasn't designed for html so it might not be the best experience, for me i couldn't press left and right click at the same time.

HOW TO PLAY: left click is thrusters and right click is boost, when you boost you shoot out a puff that will hurt enemies. last until wave 5 defeat all of the enemies and go through the portal.

This game was a lot of fun to make i really hope you enjoy it and hope you will give this game a good rating THANK YOU SO MUCH for playing!

I made all of the art, sfx and programming.

People to mention:

Fix The Gear(win music):  composed by Oscar Owl:

TeknoAXE's(menu/level music): composed by: TeknoAXE's Royalty Free

Go Time - Industrial (menu/level music): composed by: TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music
